text: Richard Norman Anderson (August 8, 1926 - August 31, 2017) was an American actor in movie and television. His best-known role was that of Oscar Goldman, the boss of Steve Austin and Jaime Sommers in both television series The Six Million Dollar Man and The Bionic Woman.""Richard Anderson Biography (1926-). Film Reference. Retrieved July 25, 2012. Anderson died on August 31, 2017 in Beverly Hills, California of congestive heart failure, aged 91. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * An hour long video interview with Retro Rewind covering his career (from 2010) Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from congestive heart failure Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New Jersey
title: Richard Anderson
